title: AMD Launches Instinct MI300 Series AI Chips, Gears Up for a Face-Off with Nvidia
description: In a move challenging Nvidia’s AI computing supremacy, AMD has launched its Instinct MI300X data center GPU, boasting superior memory capabilities and outperforming Nvidia’s flagship H100 in key AI metrics. The company’s strategic push into the AI arena has garnered support from major players like Microsoft, Dell, and HPE. This marks a significant milestone for ... Read more
